Package project

Class Product

java.lang.Object
project.Product
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiscountedProduct, FavoritesBundle
public class Product
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
The Product class stores data on a single product. Name, seller ID, quantity, etc.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Product

      public Product​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String productID, java.lang.String prodType, double salePrice, java.lang.String desc, int available, double invPrice, java.lang.String sellerId)
      Product constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of new Product
      productID - ID of Product
      prodType - Product category of new Product. Unused right now I think other than display in popup
      salePrice - the sale price
      desc - A description of the product
      available - the starting quantity of items available
      invPrice - invoice price
      sellerId - the seller's ID
